sentences.sContent: Second, your beauty could be improved if you used about one tenth as much rouge and lipstick.
sentences.sContent_eng: Second, your beauty could be improved if you used about one tenth as much rouge and lipstick.
sentences.sCn: 第二，如果您要用上十分之一的胭脂和口红，您的美貌将会改变。

synos.tran: 胭脂；口红；铁丹，[材][轻]红铁粉

phrases.pCn: 红磨坊（巴黎著名歌舞厅）
巴吞鲁日（美国路易斯安那州首府）

trans.tranCn: 口红, 胭脂, 红铁粉
trans.tranOther: pink or red powder or cream that women put on their cheeks
